channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: Endra says it can reduce the time needed to design electrical systems from months to hours.

item.title: America Needs AI That Is Pro-Human
item.description: A strong national AI framework is essential. States can help ensure that AI deployment strengthens families, workers, and human agency.

item.title: Elon Musk says there will be ‘no poverty’ in the future, implying Ray Dalio’s multi-million Trump Account pledge will be essentially redundant
item.description: "It is certainly a nice gesture," Musk said. "But there will be no poverty in the future and so no need to save money."

item.description: Lackluster demand for electric cars in the U.S. isn’t because Americans don’t want them, RJ Scaringe said. There’s just few good options.
